America Movil dominates Mexico 's telecoms market but the government is carrying out the biggest shake - up of the industry since Slim took control of former state phone monopoly Telmex in the early 1990s .
Telmex was swallowed by America Movil , its former mobile unit , in 2011 .

Seeking to reduce America Movil 's control of 70 percent of the mobile business in Mexico and 80 percent of the fixed line market , the government has rolled out a range of new antitrust measures against Slim and threatened a break - up of his firm .
America Movil 's stock hit a near four - year low after the government presented its reform in March 2013 , and it remains well below mid-2012 levels .
